mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from member order by id asc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from kakaomember order by email asc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, addr) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{addr})
mapper.update: update member set session_id=#{sessionId}, limit_time=#{limitDate} where id=#{id}
update kakaomember set addr=#{addr} where id=#{id}
update member set addr=#{addr}, pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from member where id like '%'||#{userId}||'%' order by id asc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
select B.* from(select rownum rn, A.* from (select * from kakaomember where email like '%'||#{userEmail}||'%' order by email asc)A)B where rn between #{s} and #{e}
select count(*) from member where id like '%'||#{userId}||'%'
select count(*) from kakaomember where email like '%'||#{userEmail}||'%'
